required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of HLX208 in Adult Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis (LCH) and Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD) With BRAF V600E Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Open Label, Multicenter Phase II Clinical Study in Rare Diseases to Evaluate Safety, Efficacy and PK of HLX208 for Adult Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis (LCH) and Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD) With BRAF V600E Mutation

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to assess safety, efficacy and PK in adult Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis (LCH) and Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD) given HLX208 (BRAF V600E inhibitor).

primary_outcome.description: Objective response rate(assessed by independent review committee (IRC) based on the PERCIST Version 1.0)

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events
Objective response rate(assessed by the investigator based on the PERCIST v1.0)
Objective response rate(assessed by IRC and the investigator based on the RECIST v1.1)
Disease control rate (assessed by IRC and the investigator as per PERCIST v1.0 and RECIST v1.1 )
Time to response(assessed by IRC and the investigator as per PERCIST v1.0 and RECIST v1.1)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the first dose until firstly confirmed and recorded disease progression or death (whichever occurs earlier),assessed up to 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival (PFS) (assessed by IRC and the investigator as per PERCIST v1.0 and RECIST v1.1 )

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the date of first dose until the date of death from any cause，assessed up to 1 year
from the date of first dose to 85 days
from the date of first dose to 85 days
from the date of first dose to 85 days
